name: Minesweeper 99
description:
Score high in this innovative renovation for the classic Minesweeper game!

Minesweeper 99 is an exciting renovation for the classic Minesweeper game.  It's for every game player to enjoy!  Built on the concept of original Minesweeper, but with many enhancements, especially in the following areas:

NEW! Online cross-platform leaderboard: http://www.babafish.com/minesweeper-99/scores/DisplayScores.php

  • Playable areas starts from 9*11 blocks for Beginner (15 mines). Higher difficulty has larger playable areas with more mines: Intermediate (20 mines), Expert (26 mines), Nightmare (40 mines) 
  • SHOW OFF! Game has pro-metrics such as 3BV/s and IOE to measure how good you are!
  • EASY!  Shield can counter mines detonated by mistake.  Number of available shields depend on difficulty
  • 5 languages: English, Spanish, French, Chinese Simplified and Traditional
  • Easy to use mouse control (touch-control on mobile devices), neat art & cute sound
  • Exciting MULTIPLAYER! (to be released soon)

Please do send your feedback to babafish+minesweeper99 (at) gmail.com so we can continuously improve the game for you!
